entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation. He is mentioned as having a mother and being related to Dumbledore.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Snape is a character who was working for Dumbledore, not Harry. His Patronus is revealed to be a doe.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one Snape was working for. He is also related to Harry's mother.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the antagonist in the conversation, who is being confronted by Harry.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is Voldemort's name when he was younger. He is mentioned as someone who did not understand Snape's Patronus.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are related, as revealed in the conversation. Harry mentions that Snape was working for Dumbledore.
Snape loved Harry's mother for nearly all of his life, as revealed by Harry. This is also mentioned in the context of Snape's Patronus.
Snape was working for Dumbledore, as revealed by Harry. This is mentioned in the context of Snape's Patronus and his relationship with Harry's mother.
Voldemort and Riddle are the same person, as mentioned in the conversation. This is revealed when Harry confronts Voldemort about his past.
